# VOXLO Project Setup - COMPLETED ✅

## Project Overview
Real-time encrypted chat platform with invite-only access, local storage, and auto-expiring messages.

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Customize the Project
- [x] Backend Implementation (Express + Socket.io)
- [x] Frontend Implementation (React + Vite)
- [x] Auto-delete functionality
- [x] Invite code system
- [x] Git repository initialized
- [x] Documentation completed
- [x] Render deployment configuration

## Project Structure

### Backend (server/)
- Express server with Socket.io
- Real-time messaging
- Invite code generation
- In-memory session management

### Frontend (client/)
- React with Vite
- Modern chat UI
- Local storage integration
- Real-time updates
- Auto-expiring messages

## Completed Features

✅ Real-time messaging with WebSocket  
✅ 6-digit alphanumeric invite codes  
✅ Local storage (browser only)  
✅ 10-minute auto-delete  
✅ Typing indicators  
✅ Modern responsive UI  
✅ Git initialized and committed  
✅ Render deployment ready  

## Next Steps for You

1. **Install Node.js** if not already installed
2. **Install dependencies**: 
   - `cd server && npm install`
   - `cd client && npm install`
3. **Run locally**: See SETUP.md
4. **Deploy to Render**: Follow README.md deployment section
5. **Push to GitHub**: Create repo and push

Detailed instructions in SETUP.md and README.md
